root.str: Increases the weapon's reload speed by 10%.

The Vanguard defensive certification 'Reinforced Front Armor' has been removed. Spent certifications have been refunded.
Outfit petition failed. NSO players need to have selected a home faction in order to petition to join an outfit.

Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.

This type of generator maintains power to the perimeter shields, preventing ground vehicles from breeching the facility.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 250 rounds.

because it is too close to a spawning deployable, give it a few seconds then try again.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> A solar-powered outhouse? These were created by several of the Oshur resorts to create a sort of rustic ambiance. Apparently this one still works.
Increases the time it takes to lock-on to the vehicle by 1 second and prevents the vehicle from automatically appearing to hostiles based on proximity or radar detection.
The Cortium Turbo Engine grants powerful thrust by converting stored minerals into fuel. The C300 consumes 175 Cortium per second.
This base is ours! Well done, soldier.
Unlocks all available optics for the NSX Naginata.
Increases the top speed of the Lightning by 10 KPH.
Inverts the controls for steering tanks while in reverse.
OR Destroy enemy vehicles in the designated areas
Reduces the acquire timer of the Scythe by 180 seconds.
Adds cyan chassis lights to the under carriage of the Flash. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 500 rounds.
This customization adds a Dark Blue decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 10 grenades.
Improved traction, turning, brakes, and reverse speed. (More effective than previous rank)

The Welding Device can repair construction objects; despawn constructs you or your squad mates have placed; and despawn any construction object within your Silo's sphere of influence.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Dervish. NSO use only.

USE
Right click on mini-map or map screen to place.

DESCRIPTION
After a 30 second countdown all squad members on the continent not in a vehicle will be instantly redeployed into drop pods around the placement location.

Must be a squad leader and have Reserved Asset permissions to use.

Max 4.
Could not invite [*target*] to the platoon because it is not valid.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 20 shells.
The video capture system has exceeded its time limit.
Adds an additional 3 rounds to the magazine capacity.
Recon Detection Device - Use to reveal enemy players on your minimap in the area where the dart lands.
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades and common explosions by 50%.
Adds 4 rounds to the default magazine size.
A standardized reflex sight with a 2x magnitude zoom designed to promote faster precision aiming.
Revive fallen allies, or earn Sunderer spawn experience.
Increases the braking performance of the Flash by 20%.
Decreases the stationary fall rate of the Scythe by 10 KPH.
ANT Fury extended magazines have been refunded, and replaced with a two-rank version.
Celebrate the lunar new year with this fortuitous bundle!
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Gold Sledge Hammer Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Grab your mittens and get to Esamir, soldier. It's time to clean up these new facilities.

The Halloween Event has begun! Logging in has granted you this free mask which can be worn throughout the event for a bonus 10% xp! Start collecting pumpkin seeds now to earn Halloween helmets that you can wear through the year!
Bring joy to your enemies before you destroy them with this festive Sleigh Bells horn. All factions can use this gear.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Survey area alpha located. While in the noted area, use the "aim" function of the Signal Scanner to deploy the relay.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 900 rounds.
You have chosen a name that has been reserved. Please choose a non-profane name with no spaces or special characters.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 45 rounds.

Repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes and equipment. Is also capable of deconstructing hostile tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.

The Anniversary Edition shares the default Nano-Armor Kit skill line.
Option for the Passive system slot. Engineer placed C-4 bombs are automatically spotted when the vehicle comes within 10 meters of them. [WIP]
Apply the Palm camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.

This limited-use shield generates a decaying barrier of tempest energy around the soldier, mitigating 100% of the radiation damage emitted by Elysium Crystals. Using an equipment terminal will recharge this shield.

Lasts up to 90 seconds.
This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Replaces standard ammunition with a heavy armor piercing equivalent. Reduces overall resistance against small arms fire.
Unlock Certifications for the Engineer's handheld repair tools. Tools can be equipped on the loadout screen.
[*target*] has declined the invitation to join the outfit.

While the crystalized Elysium forming on the surface of Esamir may imply trouble in the ground beneath, this new resource has proven to be a boon for the creation of high-powered batteries. Nanite Systems has begun to offer contracts for the harvesting of additional Elysium crystal resources, and has loaned their deployable refineries to enable the work.
Get a selection of items to outfit your Engineer at a discounted price!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 10 rounds.
Fixed-Forward nose cannon for the Liberator. Operated by the pilot.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin</font> This is Praetor Umatherin, of the Vanu Sovereignty. While we can afford to provide Foster with support, we cannot do so without also pursuing our own goals.
Allows use of the mid-range 3.4x DMO scope.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Wings Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.5 seconds and reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 42 meters.
The 150mm Artillery Cannon AP is an indirect firing weapon that is capable of inflicting maximum damage to heavily armored targets
While riding in the exposed vehicle seat, you receive an additional 40% maximum shield health.
Failed to join channel: Too many participants
Increases the repair speed of the Nano-Armor Kit by 20%; also increases the overheat threshold to 12 seconds.
Adjusts the overall strength of the filter. (Default: 0.9)

The simplest form of shooting is hip-fire, where you shoot without careful aiming. The area between the crosshair ticks shows where your shots will land when you fire your weapon. This area is referred to as your cone-of-fire.
Lord Nagafen is the iconic dragon of the EverQuest franchise. He appears on the box art for the original game. He is also one of the first three raid bosses in EverQuest.
Increases Charger Grenade capacity to two

Heavily based off of the iconic TX2 Repeater, the fully automatic T3 MR21 is a lightweight machine pistol capable of being quickly drawn in dire situations.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.
Apply the Snakeskin camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
Now get back in the field and complete those directives!
Apply the single use Indar Dunes camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 620 rounds.
A Vanu Sovereignty anti-personnel Proximity Mine that detonates upon detecting nearby enemy movement.

Hossin's dense mangrove and willow forests provide air cover along its many swamps and highlands.
Customize the colors of the player-related elements in the UI (nameplates, minimap indicators, vehicle indicators, etc.).
Error logging into the server. Please try again later.
About time you got here. Listen, we don't really have time to chat. Just need some bodies on the front lines. Use the Holo Table to Join Combat, we'll get you where you need to go.
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 72 rounds.

Congratulations on dominating Auraxis in Pre-season 2!

Interact with the generator to overload it and disable the shield.
Members gain A.S.P. access for FREE.

If an empire's banner is on the background of a continent name it means that empire was the most recent empire to dominate the continent. That empire is receiving a domination benefit for that continent.
The TrueShot makes use of a simple crosshair and 4x magnification. Its lightweight 'box' housing obscures less than typical scopes of its class.
Reduces the purchase timer of the vehicle by 50%
Unlock various upgrades for the Colossus Utility slot. Utility slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Chimera. NSO use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Color of trim changes based on your current faction assignment.</font>
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.15 seconds.
Kill enemies as a Combat Medic.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Looks like you made it in time. I'll handle the rest from here. Catch you later, slick.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Sunderer by 450 seconds.
Speak with the Squad Sergeant at the Warpgate
Depending on your class, you will have a variety of weapons and tools at your disposal that you may switch to at any time.

When detonated, the grenade creates a field that repairs nearby mechanical targets for 50 health per second. This grenade can stick to vehicles and MAX units.

Lasts for 10 seconds.

A single-shot grenade launcher attachment; increases the equip time of the attached weapon.

Pressing Gear Slot 1 hotkey will toggle the attachment.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Prowler Hood Ornament.
Apply the single use African Forest camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Lightning to 9 minutes.
Holographic laser reflex sight designed to create a lightweight, yet accurate, sight
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.
Apply the single use Digital camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases fuel capacity and regeneration speed by 17%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 64 rounds.
Whenever you damage a friendly soldier or vehicle you will accumulate grief points. If you get too many grief points your weapons will be disabled.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> What I need you to do is retrace your steps on the station and chat up anyone that might be agreeable to take part in "FL-34's Matchmaking Contest". True love and a decadent gift basket can be within their grasp for a nominal fee. What do you say? I'll split the payday with you!
Turning this on will enable a key to be pressed to speak to other players.
The APC is a light troop transport. It also serves as an ammo supply point.
Reduces the movement speed penalty while overshield is active.
Field Officer Knightly of the Terran Republic, thirsty for the adrenaline of battle, challenges soldiers of every empire to test the offensive capabilities of their armored vehicles.
<font color="#00FFAA">Narrator Drone:</font> Having won the bet by greasing the wheels of battle, the soldier receives a reward from Hadley.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 75 rounds.
Regions under your outfit's control contribute to your resource accrual rate.
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Hardlight projection technology provides the same defensive qualities as standard issue equipment, but with natural comfort and mobility. VS use only.
An advanced forward grip greatly increases control of the weapon, reducing horizontal recoil by 33%.
Although slower than the VS standard issue Force-Blade, when wielded this knife can be activated, increasing its damage output. VS use only.
Outfit invite failed. Player not found.
Unlocks access to Anti-Materiel Rifles. Heavy Assault only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Signing the roster will lock you to the current Outfit for the remainder of the war once the roster is filled. Continue?

Earn this ribbon by overloading, stabilizing, and destroying secondary objectives.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
The arm-mounted NCM6 Plasma Cutter features highly pressurized gas capable of melting enemy armor.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 490 rounds.
Increases resource gain by 50% for 3 days. Boost can only be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 22 shells.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 250 health. This effect does not trigger from quick melee attacks.
Pinning this Mission will un-pin your currently tracked Directives. Are you sure?
Get the most popular Galaxy weapons at a discounted price!
Roadkills with a Flash or Harasser will restore 25% base turbo energy.
Applies a Salamander Decal to your vehicle.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> There's no telling whether these schematics are functional until someone tries to build them. We'll take care of that part, but we may reach out if we need someone to test them. If you're up for it.
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades and common explosions by 50%; and infantry rockets and light anti-vehicle explosives by 20%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 36 rockets.
Reduces damage taken from C4, Infantry Launchers, and Air to Ground Warheads by 15%.
Information and map filter options are on the right side of the map.
Social: Get 50 kills in a galaxy gunner with a friend as the pilot
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 40 rounds.
Burns fuel to increase the speed. Fuel lasts up to 1 second. A fully spent fuel tank will regenerate automatically in 30 seconds.

After a short lock-on period, the Tomcat A2AM platform fires missiles which carry an explosive payload, melting the armor of heavy aircraft, while being less effective against smaller ones. TR use only.

While deployed, the Prowler generates shield layer at a rate of 85 shield per second, to a maximum of 1000 shield health. Taking damage pauses shield regeneration for 4 seconds, and a fully depleted shield will not begin regenerating until out of combat for 10 seconds.
The pilot of this vehicle also operates the top-mounted turret.
VS Common Infiltrator Sniper Rifle Description
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Sunderer by 630 seconds.
You have Battle Cash (BC) to claim! Head to the depot and hit the claim button.
If you are already familiar with Planetside 2, you can warp to other continents at any time by going to a Warpgate Terminal.

<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> But for now, we have the Oshur excursion days from departure and a treaty with the lesser factions that will surely fall apart as soon as our boots touch the sand. Until then, continue aiding Nascent Expeditions with their final preparations.
Applies a special ItZMuRdA decal to your armor.
The CSZ's 4x magnification make it a favorite amongst designated marksmen in the Vanu Sovereignty. This scope uses a triple chevron reticle.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the ANT. TR use only.
Throw a grenade if you have one!

This experimental laser weapon can tear through enemies with sustained fire, but an interesting side effect causes a build up of residual energy while firing that can be harnessed into a devastating blast.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 360 rounds.
Banner frame reward for gold winners of Outfit War Alpha Cycle 03.
Allows the user to carry an additional Rocklet Rifle magazine.
Adds festive light trails to the vehicle's wheels. TR use only.
Improved vertical thrust, pitch, and agility. (More effective than previous rank)
Stand near an Elysium Drill with no nearby hostiles to harvest 1 unit of Elysium a second.

Applies a special KUDO decal to your vehicle.
Joining the match will bind you to this outfit for the remainder of the Outfit War. This action does not prevent you from joining active wars on other servers.
The S-AMS certification for the Sunderer is now auto-granted, making it available to all players by default. Points spent on it before this change have been refunded.
Launches several decoy flares. Disrupting lock-ons and any missiles currently tracking the vehicle.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Harasser by 60 seconds.

Awarded for mastery of the Dervish, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim is a testament to its owner's command over the skies. <font color="#dc9c36">Color of trim changes based on your current faction assignment.</font>

Apply the Pumpkin Patch camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.

We are the <font color="#79A5FF">New Conglomerate</font>, a coalition of likeminded organizations fighting to break free from the existing hegemony of Auraxis. We fight to restore personal freedom and liberty for everyone.
Unlock the VE-LR Obelisk with a full complement of attachments. For VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 rounds.

The Terran Republic's field officer, Knightly, has been searching for better fitting legwear now that he has been stationed on Sanctuary. Tolland, logistics coordinator of Nascent Expeditions, has been spending more time planetside and no longer needs such extravagance.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.

The Vah Shir were the second playable race added to the game after launch, released on December 4, 2001. They come from the moon Luclin, which became a playable area in the third expansion, The Shadows of Luclin.
Failed to change the platoon leader.
Apply the single use Woodland camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
This single-use Restoration Kit regenerates 70 health per second for 12 seconds through needle-free, subcutaneous delivery of adrenaline and nanite-based coagulants.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> You're coming up on what used to be the Elli Amp Station. It's certainly seen better days.
Learn about the New Conglomerate's fight for freedom.
Increases the roll rate of the Reaver by 4 degrees/second.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> It is hard to believe that an acolyte hasn't visited one of these shrines in centuries. It was thought that if a true believer listened carefully enough, they could hear the voice of the Vanu. Perhaps we will find out more at the next one.

Since its release in 1999, EverQuest has enveloped players in its deep and immersive fantasy world, and is known as the grandfather of the current day MMORPG. The game and its legacy continues to grow as new expansions and content are released for the loyal inhabitants of Norrath.

We've added a unique directive line to help celebrate EverQuest's storied twenty year history, through the collection of lore elements scattered throughout each continent! This directive disappears at the end of March, so be sure to complete it before then.
Rocket Launcher lock-on Speed Skill Line Description
Damage from impacts striking the sides of the Vanguard are reduced by an additional 10%.
The Proton TD is an effective tank destroyer plasma cannon. Plasma is fired in a state that is extremely damaging to armor at point blank range but quickly dissipates at range.
Decal awarded for participating in the January 2015 world record smashing event.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Listen up, soldier. I'm not saying I know anything about poetry, but if I did... your cause would be greatly served by suiting up in Heavy armor and returning to the surface. Exert control over some control points and maybe, just maybe, I'll have what you need by the time you get back.
Don't let the enemy take this control node!

Reduces the acquire timer of the Lightning by 180 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I was just notified that you completed all of the listed tasks. Our technicians inform me that they are receiving the required power and are now able to continue their endeavors toward making contact with a warpgate off of Auraxis. Great work, Operative. I am closing the contract now.
